subject: fix: implement web pull-to-refresh on home screen
body:
RefreshControl doesn't support pull-to-refresh gestures on web platforms.
This adds custom touch event handling to detect pull gestures at the top
of the scroll view and trigger page refresh on web.

- Add touch event listeners for touchstart/touchmove/touchend on web
- Track scroll position to detect when user is at top of list
- Show animated pull indicator with threshold feedback
- Trigger window.location.reload when threshold is reached
- Keep native RefreshControl for iOS/Android platforms
title: implement web pull-to-refresh on home screen
